marketing_homepage.howItWorksTitle: How It Works in 3 Simple Steps
marketing_homepage.step1Description: Securely upload your PDF bank statement.
marketing_homepage.step2Description: Our smart AI processes and structures your transaction data accurately.
marketing_homepage.step3Description: Get a clean, organized Excel file ready for your needs.
marketing_homepage.featuresTitle: Powerful Features for Bank Statement Conversion
marketing_homepage.feature1Description: Transform any PDF bank statement into clean, structured Excel spreadsheets. Extract transactions from Chase, Wells Fargo, Bank of America, and 500+ major banks worldwide.
marketing_homepage.feature2Description: Advanced artificial intelligence ensures 99%+ accuracy when extracting dates, amounts, descriptions, and transaction types from your bank statements.
marketing_homepage.feature3Description: Your financial data is protected with enterprise-grade encryption. GDPR compliant with zero data retention - files deleted immediately after processing.
marketing_homepage.feature4Description: Convert bank statements in under 30 seconds. Process multi-page documents instantly and download your Excel file immediately.
marketing_homepage.feature5Description: Convert bank statements in English, Spanish, and Portuguese. Works with international banks and supports multiple currency formats automatically.
marketing_homepage.feature6Description: Start with 50 free pages - no credit card required. Upgrade for unlimited monthly conversions and priority support when you need more capacity.
marketing_homepage.testimonial1Quote: This tool saved me hours of manual data entry! Converting PDF statements to Excel is now a breeze.
marketing_homepage.testimonial2Quote: Finally, an easy way to get my bank data into Excel. Highly recommend!
marketing_homepage.testimonial3Quote: Secure, fast, and accurate. What more could you ask for?
marketing_homepage.faq1Answer: Yes, absolutely. We prioritize your data's security and privacy. All uploads and processing are encrypted, and we adhere to strict data protection policies. We do not store your files after processing.
marketing_homepage.faq2Answer: Currently, Bank Statement Convert supports PDF files. We are continuously working to expand our support for other formats.
marketing_homepage.faq3Question: How accurate is the data extraction?
marketing_homepage.faq3Answer: Our AI is trained on a vast number of bank statements to ensure high accuracy. While we strive for perfection, we recommend a quick review of the converted Excel file, especially for complex statements.
marketing_homepage.faq4Question: Is there a limit on file size or number of pages?
marketing_homepage.faq4Answer: Our free plan has certain limitations. Paid plans offer higher limits on file size and the number of pages you can convert per month. Please check our Pricing page for more details.
marketing_homepage.faq5Question: Can I use Bank Statement Convert on my mobile device?
marketing_homepage.faq5Answer: Yes, Bank Statement Convert is designed to be responsive and can be accessed from any device, including desktops, tablets, and smartphones.
marketing_homepage.ctaTitle: Ready to Simplify Your Bank Statement Conversions?
marketing_homepage.ctaSubtitle: Stop wasting time on manual data entry. Start converting your bank statements to Excel effortlessly today.

pricing_page.title: Find the Perfect Plan
pricing_page.subtitle: Start for free, or choose a plan that scales with your needs. No hidden fees, cancel anytime.
pricing_page.premium_description: Best for power users and small businesses.
pricing_page.faq_subtitle: Have more questions? We're here to help.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards, including Visa, Mastercard, American Express, and Discover. Payments are processed securely via Stripe.

faqs.question: Can I change my plan later?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time from your account settings. Changes will be prorated.

faqs.question: Is there a discount for annual billing?
faqs.answer: Yes! You can save significantly (up to ~40% depending on the plan) by choosing to pay annually instead of monthly.

faqs.question: What counts as a 'page' for billing?
faqs.answer: A 'page' refers to one page of a processed bank statement document. For example, a 5-page PDF statement will count as 5 pages towards your monthly limit.

faqs.question: What happens if I exceed my monthly page limit?
faqs.answer: If you exceed your monthly page limit, you'll be prompted to upgrade to a higher plan. Alternatively, you can wait until your next billing cycle for your quota to reset.

about_page.title: About Bank Statement Convert
about_page.subtitle: Learn more about our mission, vision, and the team dedicated to simplifying your financial data management.
about_page.mission_text: To empower individuals and businesses by providing an intuitive, secure, and accurate tool for converting bank statements into actionable data. We aim to save you time and effort in managing your financial records.
about_page.vision_text: To be the leading solution for financial document conversion and analysis, continuously innovating to meet the evolving needs of our users and helping them achieve greater financial clarity and control.
about_page.story_paragraph_1: Bank Statement Convert was born out of a simple frustration: the tedious and time-consuming process of manually transcribing bank statement data. As finance professionals and software developers, we knew there had to be a better way.
about_page.story_paragraph_2: We envisioned a tool that was not only powerful but also accessible and easy to use for everyone, regardless of their technical expertise. After months of research, development, and user feedback, Bank Statement Convert came to life.
about_page.story_paragraph_3: Today, we're proud to help thousands of users streamline their financial workflows, and we're just getting started!
about_page.value_1_description: Our users are at the heart of everything we do. We strive to understand their needs and deliver solutions that genuinely help.
about_page.value_2_description: We are committed to protecting your data with the highest security standards and respecting your privacy.
about_page.value_3_description: We aim for precision in every conversion, ensuring you can trust the data you work with.
about_page.cta_description: Join thousands of satisfied users and take control of your bank statement data today.

contact_page.title: Get in Touch
contact_page.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have a question, feedback, or need support, feel free to reach out.
contact_page.form_success_message: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.

pricing.title: Bank Statement Convert Pricing | Free & Pro Plans
pricing.description: Choose the perfect plan for your needs. Free plan includes 50 pages. Pro plans offer unlimited conversions, priority support & advanced features. No hidden fees.

terms_page.title: Terms of Service
terms_page.subtitle: Please read these Terms of Service carefully before using our service.
terms_page.section_1_content: By creating an account, accessing, or using the Bank Statement Convert web application ('the Service'), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ('Terms') and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to these Terms, do not use the Service.
terms_page.section_2_content: Subject to your compliance with these Terms and your subscription plan, Bank Statement Convert grants you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to access and use the Service for your personal or internal business purposes. You are responsible for the legality of the files you upload. You may not resell the Service or use it to process data for third parties on a commercial basis without our express written permission.
terms_page.section_3_content: The Service is provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis. While we strive for high accuracy in data extraction, Bank Statement Convert makes no warranties, express or implied, regarding the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of the extracted data. You are solely responsible for reviewing and verifying the accuracy of any data before use.
terms_page.section_4_content: In no event shall Bank Statement Convert, its directors, or employees be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including loss of profits, data, or other intangible losses, resulting from your use of the Service or your reliance on the accuracy of the data provided by the Service.
terms_page.section_5_content: We do not own the data you submit to the Service. Our use of your data is governed by our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these Terms. We do not store your uploaded files after processing.
terms_page.section_6_content: You must provide accurate and complete information when creating an account. You are responsible for safeguarding your password and for all activities that occur under your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.
terms_page.section_7_content: The Service is billed on a subscription basis. You will be billed in advance on a recurring basis (monthly or annually). You may cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings, and it will remain active until the end of the current billing cycle.
terms_page.section_8_content: Due to the nature of our automated service and the immediate costs associated with processing documents, we do not offer refunds or credits for any fees, including for partially used subscription periods or downgrades. All sales are final, except as required by applicable law.
terms_page.section_9_content: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice, if you breach these Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the Service will cease immediately.
terms_page.section_10_content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will provide at least 30 days' notice of any material changes by posting the new Terms on this site and updating the 'Last updated' date.
terms_page.section_11_content: These Terms shall be governed by the laws of the jurisdiction in which our company is registered, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
terms_page.section_12_content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us through our contact page.

privacy_page.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_page.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.
privacy_page.section_1_content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a purchase, upload files, or contact us for support. This may include your name, email address, payment information, and the bank statement files you upload for processing.
privacy_page.section_2_content: We use the information we collect to: provide, maintain, and improve our services; process transactions and send related information; send technical notices, updates, security alerts, and support messages; respond to your comments, questions, and requests; communicate about products, services, offers, and events.
privacy_page.section_3_content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties. We may share your information in certain limited circumstances: with your consent; to comply with laws or respond to lawful requests; to protect our rights, property, and safety and that of our users and the public.
privacy_page.section_4_content: We take reasonable measures to help protect information about you from loss, theft, misuse, and unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction. All uploaded files are processed securely and deleted immediately after conversion.
privacy_page.section_5_content: We retain your account information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you services. Bank statement files are processed immediately and permanently deleted from our servers after conversion.
privacy_page.section_6_content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to collect and use personal information about you. You can control cookies through your browser settings.
privacy_page.section_7_content: Our service integrates with third-party services including payment processors (Stripe) and authentication providers (Clerk). These services have their own privacy policies governing the collection and use of your information.
privacy_page.section_8_content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your privacy.
privacy_page.section_9_content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You can do this through your account settings or by contacting us directly.
privacy_page.section_10_content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the 'Last updated' date.
privacy_page.section_11_content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through our contact page.
